column4: New user here, I'm running this from a cd, is there any way to get to my hard drive?
Cool, thanks for the quick answer. h3h. I snooped around and couldn't figure it out.
there should be an icon from your desktop... double click on that and it should run esspresso installer....unless you have an older version of ubuntu, but i know dapper has it... does breezy too
what version of the Ubuntu live CD do you have
